name: Of Mice and Moggies (itch)
description:
Of Mice and Moggies

Of Mice and Moggies is a smart puzzle game, where you play a cat that tries to catch various animals. The levels can look simple at first, but require you to constantly find new ways of combining the animals and objects. The puzzles must be solved by being smart and don't overwhelm you with a huge numbers of moving parts.

Editor and Community Levels

You can build your own levels with the same tool we used: the ingame level editor. The levels can be uploaded and made available for other players to enjoy, just like you can play the levels other people made.

Join us

Join us on Discord, to talk about the game, get tips or if there is a technical problem.

This game is based on our Ludum Dare 44 entry Fluffensnuff.
